text: ALSO present is a London journalist who arrived two hours earlier by appointment to talk to the author of Borstal Boy and The Hostage about his new work, if any, and who is now being pluckily convivial to fight off the frustration. The telephone has by for a chat.
handwritten_text: ALSO present is a London journalist who arrived two hours earlier by appointment to talk to the author of Borstal Boy and The Hostage about his new work, if any, and who is now being pluckily convivial to fight off the frustration. The telephone has by for a chat.
